actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to include foreign deposits and non-deposit liabilities in the assessment base.
short_title: Federal Deposit Insurance Fair Assessment Act

summary.text: Federal Deposit Insurance Fair Assessment Act - Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to: (1) include within the definition of "deposit" non-deposit liabilities; and (2) exclude from such definition obligations to either a Federal Reserve Bank or a Federal Home Loan Bank. Mandates the collection of deposit insurance premiums on foreign accounts in American banks.

titles.title: Federal Deposit Insurance Fair Assessment Act
A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to include foreign deposits and non-deposit liabilities in the assessment base.
